entry.title: Types: what they are, why to care, and how to use them in Python
entry.summary:
Description

Type systems are among the hottest toys in town, with a new typed language transpiling to JavaScript every week. But isn't that incompatible with Python's fast, productive, dynamic typing?

In this talk, I'll introduce these things called 'types', and motivate and demonstrate their use in Python.

Copyright belongs to â€¦
entry.content:
Description

Type systems are among the hottest toys in town, with a new typed language transpiling to JavaScript every week. But isn't that incompatible with Python's fast, productive, dynamic typing?

In this talk, I'll introduce these things called 'types', and motivate and demonstrate their use in Python.

Copyright belongs to the speaker.
